original_title: Over 120,000 tourist arrivals recorded in July
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka has recorded over 120,000 tourist arrivals from 01 – 27 July , Minister of Tourism Harin Fernando revealed.
Accordingly, a total of 123,503 tourist arrivals have been recorded for the month of July, he said.
Minister Fernando further noted that a total of 748,377 tourist arrivals have been recorded thus far this year.
